query.value:
SELECT A.N_IDX, A.N_PARENT_IDX, A.N_LIST, A.N_LEVEL, N_RIDX, A.V_DESC, A.V_REG_DATETIME, FN_TIMEGAP(A.V_EDT_DATETIME) AS V_EDT_DATETIME, A.N_OWNER_IDX, B.V_EMAIL AS V_OWNER_EMAIL, B.V_NAME AS V_OWNER_NAME,
C.N_IDX AS N_ASSIGNER_IDX, C.V_EMAIL AS V_ASSIGNER_EMAIL, C.V_NAME AS V_ASSIGNER_NAME,
A.C_OFF_YN, A.C_DEL_YN,
A.C_STATUS, A.V_HIDE, Z.N_TBL_IDX AS N_FAVORITE FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A LEFT JOIN TIMECLOUD_FAVORITE Z ON A.N_IDX = Z.N_TASK_IDX AND Z.N_OWNER_IDX = ? AND Z.V_TBL_NM = ?, TIMECLOUD_USER B, TIMECLOUD_USER C WHERE A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX AND C.N_IDX = (SELECT N_OWNER_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX = A.N_PARENT_IDX) AND A.N_LIST = (SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX=?) ORDER BY N_RIDX
SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX = ?
SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX = ? AND C_OFF_YN = 'N' AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET C_OFF_YN = 'Y' ,v_edt_datetime=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=?
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET C_OFF_YN = 'N' ,v_edt_datetime=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=?
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET C_STATUS=? ,v_edt_datetime=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=? AND C_DEL_YN='N' AND C_OFF_YN = 'N'
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET V_HIDE=? ,v_edt_datetime=TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=? AND C_DEL_YN='N' AND C_OFF_YN = 'N'

SELECT N_IDX , V_DESC , C_OFF_YN , V_REG_DATETIME , V_EDT_DATETIME , N_LIST , N_PARENT_IDX ,(SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE (A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_IDX=X.N_PARENT_IDX) AS V_PARENT_USER ,C_STATUS ,C_TASK_TYPE FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X WHERE N_OWNER_IDX = ? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY N_IDX DESC
SELECT N_LIST, N_LEVEL, N_RIDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX = ? AND N_OWNER_IDX = ? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT N_IDX , V_DESC , C_OFF_YN , FN_TIMEGAP(V_REG_DATETIME) as v_reg_datetime , FN_TIMEGAP(V_EDT_DATETIME) as v_edt_datetime , N_LIST , N_PARENT_IDX ,(SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE (A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_IDX=X.N_PARENT_IDX) AS V_PARENT_USER ,C_STATUS ,C_TASK_TYPE ,V_HIDE FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X WHERE N_OWNER_IDX = ? $0$ AND C_TASK_TYPE LIKE(?) AND C_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX ,X.N_LEVEL ,X.V_DESC ,(SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE (A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_IDX=X.N_PARENT_IDX) AS V_PARENT_USER ,Y.V_NAME as V_OWNER_NAME ,X.N_OWNER_IDX ,X.C_STATUS ,X.C_OFF_YN ,X.C_DEL_YN ,X.V_HIDE FROM (SELECT A.* FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A , (SELECT N_IDX,N_LIST,N_PARENT_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX=?) B WHERE A.N_IDX=B.N_IDX OR (A.N_IDX=B.N_PARENT_IDX AND A.N_LEVEL>0) OR (A.N_IDX=B.N_LIST AND A.N_LEVEL=0) ORDER BY N_LEVEL ASC ) X, TIMECLOUD_USER Y WHERE (X.N_OWNER_IDX=Y.N_IDX)

SELECT N_IDX, V_DESC, C_OFF_YN, V_REG_DATETIME, V_EDT_DATETIME, N_LIST, N_PARENT_IDX ,(SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE (A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_IDX=X.N_PARENT_IDX) AS V_PARENT_USER ,N_OWNER_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X WHERE N_IDX = ? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT N_IDX , V_DESC , C_OFF_YN , V_REG_DATETIME , V_EDT_DATETIME , N_LIST , N_PARENT_IDX ,(SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK A, TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE (A.N_OWNER_IDX = B.N_IDX) AND A.N_IDX=X.N_PARENT_IDX) AS V_PARENT_USER , N_OWNER_IDX , C_STATUS , C_DEL_YN FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X WHERE N_IDX = (SELECT N_LIST FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_IDX=?) AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'
SELECT seq_task_idx.nextval FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TIMECLOUD_TASK( N_IDX, N_PARENT_IDX, N_LIST, N_LEVEL, N_RIDX, V_DESC, V_REG_DATETIME, V_EDT_DATETIME, N_OWNER_IDX, N_DOMAIN_IDX ) VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), TO_CHAR(sysdate,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), ?, ? )
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET N_RIDX = N_RIDX+1 WHERE N_LIST = ? AND N_RIDX > ? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.C_OFF_YN , FN_TIMEGAP(X.V_REG_DATETIME) AS V_REG_DATETIME , FN_TIMEGAP(X.V_EDT_DATETIME) AS V_EDT_DATETIME , X.N_LIST, X.N_PARENT_IDX ,( SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE B.N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX ) AS V_CHILD_USER ,X.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X, ( SELECT N_IDX, N_OWNER_IDX FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE N_OWNER_IDX=? ) Y WHERE X.N_PARENT_IDX = Y.N_IDX AND X.N_LEVEL>0 ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC

SELECT X.N_IDX, X.V_DESC, X.C_OFF_YN , FN_TIMEGAP(X.V_REG_DATETIME) AS V_REG_DATETIME , FN_TIMEGAP(X.V_EDT_DATETIME) AS V_EDT_DATETIME , X.N_LIST, X.N_PARENT_IDX ,( SELECT (B.N_IDX ||'-'|| B.V_NAME) FROM TIMECLOUD_USER B WHERE B.N_IDX=X.N_OWNER_IDX ) AS V_TASK_OWNER ,X.C_STATUS FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK X, TIMECLOUD_OBSERVER Y WHERE X.N_IDX = Y.N_TASK_IDX AND Y.N_OWNER_IDX=? ORDER BY X.N_IDX DESC
SELECT c_task_type FROM TIMECLOUD_TASK WHERE n_idx=?
UPDATE TIMECLOUD_TASK SET C_TASK_TYPE=? WHERE N_IDX=? AND N_OWNER_IDX=? AND C_DEL_YN = 'N'
